content: gansey socks materials 2 -50 gm skeins 166yds/152 m patons kroy socks color #1007- flax or approx 340yds of fingering weight yarn ** a note about the yardage needed one skein of patons kroy socks per sock should be sufficient but it is close the model sock was for my own foot which is a size 10 my foot is 9 around midfoot and 10 in length the finished sock measurements for my sock were 8 round and 9 in length unstretched a good fit which left almost 6 yards of yarn leftover ** needles 2-24 circular needles size us 1 2 25 mm or size to obtain gauge gauge 32 sts/44 rnds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch finished size 8 midfoot circumference leg co 64 sts divide them evenly onto the two needles and join for working in the round k2 p2 rib for 1 75 inches k 2 rounds p 3 rounds k 3 rounds p 3 rounds k 2 rounds work herringbone pattern of choice for left or right sock for 15 row k 2 rounds p 3 rounds k 3 rounds p 3 rounds then work in stockinette stitch knit every round for approx 1 5 inches or until desired length to ankle heel flap work back and forth on one needle only row 1 rs * sl 1 k1 repeat from * across row 2 ws - sl 1 p across repeat these two row for 32 row total you will have 16 selvedge stitches along sides of heel tip this is actually easier to count if you count the number of slipped stitches in a column on the heel heel turn row 1 k 18 ssk k 1 turn row 2 sl 1 p 5 p 2 decrease p 1 turn row 3 sl 1 k to 1 st before gap made in previous row ssk k 1 turn row 4 sl 1 p to 1 st before gap p 2 decrease p 1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until you have worked all heel sts k across heel stitches with heel needle pick up and knit 17 sts on left side of heel flap with instep needle knit across instep sts then again with heel needle pick up and knit 17 sts along other side of heel flap knit to end of heel needle knit across instep needle then begin gusset gusset round 1 k1 ssk k to last 3 sts on heel needle k2 decrease k 1 knit across instep round 2 k all sts repeat these 2 rnds until you have 32 sts on both needles foot continue to work in stockinette stitch until foot reaches base of big toe or approx 2 inches less than desired length of sock toe round 1 sole k 1 ssk k to last 3 sts on needle k 2 decrease k1 repeat for instep needle round 2 k all sts repeat these 2 rounds until 32 sts remain 16 on each needle
